Topic.Title: Feudal Online, From Quest to Success

Posts.EditableText: Feudal Online (Or Feudal...) was originally started here using quest a good few years ago. Due to my limitations, and determination to want to go further, and better, I decided to take my ideas to another engine in which i was able to do things as freely as possible. If anybody remember my old ideas for Feudal(Online), head over to http://www.mugen.nevetsweb.com to see how far i've got so far. Please comment here on the look and ideas of the game, but do not ask for support. you can email me at mugen@nevetsweb.com for queries and information.
Posts.HTML:
Feudal Online (Or Feudal...) was originally started here using quest a good few years ago. Due to my limitations, and determination to want to go further, and better, I decided to take my ideas to another engine in which i was able to do things as freely as possible.

If anybody remember my old ideas for Feudal(Online), head over to http://www.mugen.nevetsweb.com to see how far i've got so far.

Please comment here on the look and ideas of the game, but do not ask for support.

you can email me at mugen@nevetsweb.com for queries and information.
